headline.main: Television This Week; OF SPECIAL INTEREST

docs.lead_paragraph: In spite of decisions by at least 7 million Americans over the last decade to quit smoking, and in spite of persistent attacks by health organizations and the Federal Government, the $7 billion cigarette industry has managed not only to survive but, for the most part, to prosper.
